description: In this video we will review strategies for achieving various scalability goals for applications and databases, and help guide you in deciding which methods are best for your business. Topics we will focus on are: scaling techniques, read vs write scaling, pros and trade off for choosing Horizontal vs Vertical scaling, tools for scaling Postgres, and lesson learned from our experiences.
